thread.title: BRIEF-China Auto Logistics Says Receipt of 'allegations' Of Related Party Transactions From Shareholder, Audit Committee Deemed It Advisable To Start Investigation

title: BRIEF-China Auto Logistics Says Receipt of 'allegations' Of Related Party Transactions From Shareholder, Audit Committee Deemed It Advisable To Start Investigation

organizations.name: start investigation market news  27 am / updated
audit committee deemed it advisable to start investigation reuters

text:
Market News  27 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-China Auto Logistics Says Receipt of 'allegations' Of Related Party Transactions From Shareholder, Audit Committee Deemed It Advisable To Start Investigation Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - China Auto Logistics Inc: 
* AFTER RECEIVING ‘ALLEGATIONS’ OF RELATED PARTY TRANSACTIONS FROM A SHAREHOLDER, AUDIT COMMITTEE DEEMED IT ADVISABLE TO START INVESTIGATION 
* CO'S FORM 10-K FOR PERIOD ENDED DEC 31, 2017 DUE TO BE FILED ON APRIL 17, 2018 WILL BE DELAYED - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2v7AgdI ) Further company coverage:
